actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize cooperative operation, maintenance, and repair of the Chester Bridge, Missouri and Illinois, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the states of Illinois and Missouri to enter into a contract with the city of Chester, Illinois, to operate, maintain, and repair the Chester Bridge, Missouri and Illinois.

titles.title: A bill to authorize cooperative operation, maintenance, and repair of the Chester Bridge, Missouri and Illinois, and for other purposes.
